title: Spirit Town: Sexy Poses at Haunted Spots Cursed Vengeful Spirit Video Collection
overview: Miho Ayane, an erotic idol with a psychic sense, goes to a terrifying haunted place and quells the spirits by not exorcising them, but by appeasing them. What's more, the spirit is appeased by striking a sexy pose! This is an exploration documentary with a mix of scary and sexy that has never been seen in past psychic documentaries!
